page.title: 06Employment
page.content: The present Blacksmith's workshop has been open since 1926.The former workshop was on the site of the present school. The workshop is rented. Today's Blacksmith has worked here for 7 years. He employs 5 people two of whom are apprentices.All the employees travel to Forteviot. The majority of the work is carried out away from the village.Types of work include chain link fencing,railings,gates and agricultural work. Cars are also repaired by the mechanic. Nowadays, the Blacksmith has 5 vehicles and new tools include electric saws.No horse shoeing has been done these last seven years.
